name: Energy Detector
category: 進階電腦週邊設備：週邊設備

pages.text: The Energy Detector can detect energy flow and acts as a resistor. You can define the max flow rate to use it as a resistor.$(p)For the full documentation please see the $(9)$(l:https://docs.srendi.de/peripherals/energy_detector/)official wiki page$(/l)$()!

mapping.0: 計算機工藝：進階計算機

pages.text: Connect your Energy Detector to a computer to make use of it!
